channel.title: [508] AGS Spec < Dark bow spec

item.title: [508] AGS Spec < Dark bow spec
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The AGS in my 508 source hitâ€™s very rarely while fighting another player(same for npcs), however the dark bow usually always hits.

Here is my AGS spec:

case 11694: /** * Armadyl Godsword */ p.requestGFX(1222, 0); p.requestAnim(7074, 0); p.damageSpecDelay = 1; p.enableSpecDamage = true; isSpecWep = true; break;

Here is my dark bow:

case 11235: /** * Dark Bow */ p.requestAnim(426, 0); p.damageSpecDelay = 3; p.enableSpecDamage = true; if (p.equipment[13] == 11212) { p.frames.addProjectile(p, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 90, 1099, 46, 31, p.attackNpc, true); p.frames.addProjectile2(p, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 120, 1099, 46, 31, p.attackNpc, true); p.frames.playSound(p, 3731, 1, 0); } else { p.frames.addProjectile(p, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 90, 1102, 46, 31, p.attackNpc, true); p.frames.addProjectile(p, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 120, 1102, 46, 31, p.attackNpc, true); p.frames.playSound(p, 3731, 1, 0); } isSpecWep = true;

Does it just have to do with the defence bonus, or how can I make the AGS more accurate?

Read full topic
